item.title: The Talos Principle on Steam
item.description:
The Talos Principle on Steam

"An adept and satisfying puzzle game with a narrative that requires a bit of player investment to yield its biggest rewards." Read the full review here. Dear philosophers, The Talos Principle and most of its DLCs are currently 66% off, Road to Gehenna 33% off!!!
